sentences: Peter Baltes (born 4 April 1958) is a German hard rock and heavy metal musician.
He joined them in 1976 after Dieter Rubach left the band and also made minor contributions as a lead vocalist with Accept on their early albums and on the album Predator of 1996.
After 42 years as a member, Baltes announced his departure from Accept in November 2018; the band later replaced him with former Uli Jon Roth sideman Martin Motnik.
Voted number 1 bass player in Burn Magazine reader's poll of 1985.
Voted best bass player in Europe for Metal Hammer magazine in 1985.
